The Model

Source: vignettes/model.Rmd
model.Rmd

The age structured SEIR model with infected compartments stratified by symptoms, severity and treatment seeking and access.

$$\begin{aligned} ~ & = ~ -S ~ ~ ~ + ~ R ~ + ~ A ~ ~ S ~ - ~ ~ ~ S ~ + ~ bP \ \ ~ & = ~ S ~ ~ ~ - ~ E ~ + ~ A ~ ~ E ~ - ~ ~ ~ E \ \ ~ & = ~ (1 ~ - ~ p_{clin})(1 ~ - ~ p_{ihr}) ~ ~ E ~ - ~ v_I I ~ + ~ A ~ ~ I ~ - ~ ~ ~ I \ \ ~ & = ~ p_{clin}(1 ~ - ~ p_{ihr}) ~ ~ E ~ - ~ v_I C ~ + ~ A ~ ~ C ~ - ~ C \ \ ~ & = ~ v_I (I ~ + ~ C) ~ + ~ A ~ ~ R ~ - ~ R ~ - ~ ~ ~ R ~ + ~ (1 ~ - ~ H p{ifr})v_H ~ ~ H \ ~ & + ~ (1 ~ - ~ {H_c} p{ifr})v_H ~ ~ H ~ + ~ (1 ~ - ~ U p{ifr})v_U ~ ~ U \ ~ & + ~ (1 ~ - ~ {U_c} p{ifr})v_U ~ ~ U ~ + ~ (1 ~ - ~ {V} p{ifr})v_V ~ ~ V \ ~ & + ~ (1 ~ - ~ {V_c} p{ifr})v_V ~ ~ V \ \ ~ & = ~ p_{ihr}(1 ~ - ~ p_U)(1 ~ - ~ p{K_H})E ~ - ~ v_H H ~ + ~ A ~ ~ H ~ - ~ ~ ~ H \ \ ~ & = ~ p_{ihr}(1 ~ - ~ p_U)p_{K_H}E ~ - ~ v_H H_c ~ + ~ A ~ ~ H_c ~ - ~ ~ ~ H_c \ \ ~ & = ~ p_{ihr} p_U (1 ~ - ~ p_{K_U})(1 ~ - ~ p_V)E ~ - ~ v_U U ~ + ~ A ~ ~ U ~ - ~ ~ ~ U \ \ ~ & = ~ p_{ihr} p_U p_{K_U} (1 ~ - ~ p_v)E ~ - ~ v_U U_c ~ + ~ A ~ ~ U_c ~ - ~ ~ ~ U_c \ \ ~ & = ~ p_{ihr} p_U(1 ~ - ~ p_{K_U})(1 ~ - ~ p_{K_V})p_V E ~ - ~ v_V V ~ + ~ A ~ ~ V ~ - ~ ~ ~ V \ \ ~ & = ~ p_{ihr} p_U(1 ~ - ~ p_{K_U})p_{K_V} p_V E ~ - ~ v_V V_c ~ + ~ A ~ ~ V_c ~ - ~ ~ ~ V_c \ \ \ P ~ & = ~ (S ~ + ~ E ~ + ~ I ~ + ~ R ~ + ~ H ~ + ~ H_c ~ + ~ U ~ + ~ U_c ~ + ~ V ~ + ~ V_c) \ \ \ s ~ & = ~ 1 ~ + ~ a cos (2 ) \ \ \ W ~ & = ~ W_{home} ~ + ~ W_{work} ~ + ~ W_{school} ~ + ~ W_{other} \ \ \ ~ & = ~ p ~ s ~ W ~ ~ ( ) \ \ \ A ~ & = ~ \[\begin{pmatrix} \begin{pmatrix} -1 & 0 \\ 1 & -1 \end{pmatrix} & \ldots & 0 \\ \vdots & \ddots \begin{pmatrix} -1 & 0 \\ 1 & -1 \end{pmatrix} \ddots & \vdots \\ 0 & \ldots & \begin{pmatrix} -1 & 0 \\ 1 & 0 \end{pmatrix} \end{pmatrix}\]

\ \ \ where: & \ \ & \ \ S ~ & = ~ \ E ~ & = ~ \ I ~ & = ~ \ C ~ & = ~ \ R ~ & = ~ \ H ~ & = ~ \ H_c ~ & = ~ \ U ~ & = ~ \ U_c ~ & = ~ \ V ~ & = ~ \ V_c ~ & = ~ \ \ and \ \ & \ \ W_{home} ~ & = ~ \ W_{work} ~ & = ~ \ W_{school} ~ & = ~ \ W_{other} ~ & = ~ \ ~ & = ~ \ b ~ & = ~ \ p ~ & = ~

\end{aligned}$$
